title: FruitHub
paragraph: FruitHub  is a fully responsive real estate platform built using the MEARN stack for modern property management.
challenges: Implementing secure authentication and role-based access control.
futureUpdate: AI-based property recommendations and interactive 3D property views.

title: MovieMaster Pro
paragraph: TaskFlow is a simple task management web app designed to improve productivity and team collaboration.
challenges: Handling real-time task updates and user synchronization.
futureUpdate: Adding team chat, task analytics, and AI-powered task suggestions.
sub_title: MovieMaster Pro — A Modern Movie Management Platform
